content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.-melsen-mac-forced-fwd'> <front> <title>MAC Forced Forwarding: An ARP proxy method for ensuring traffic separation  between hosts sharing an Ethernet access network</title>  <author initials='T' surname='Melsen' fullname='Torben Melsen'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='January' day='16' year='2004' /> </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft--melsen-mac-forced-fwd-00' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft--melsen-mac-forced-fwd-00.txt' /> </reference>
